about_the_game:
Ambassador Gauss isn't out to save the world -- but for love, they just might find themselves stopping a war before it starts.

But, of course, keeping your king's sword in his sheathe isn't easy. What should've been a ten minute, boring, meeting with a foreign dignitary becomes a heated, passionate, affair that throws into question the very foundations of their allegiance to their nation.

Can Gauss navigate these rough waters while still staving off war? Can they keep their secrets safe -- and in their pants?

Set in the Untamed World, a post-post-apocalypse (sic) dark fantasy world created by the Forgotten Workshop. Read as intrigue splashes up against romance, duty stains honor, and lords and lieges swap places for a set of hot, sizzling, moments.

Features

  • Kinetic Visual Novel
  • Erotic Scenes with tantalizing text
  • 25 Event CGs
  • Unlockable CG Gallery
  • Rewindable Log
  • 1200~ lines of Sexy, Politically Intriguing, Romance

content_descriptors.notes:
Sexual content you will encounter during play:
Light Domination/Submission (no pain)
Fellatio
Prostate Massage
(Light, Playful) Humiliation
Master/Slave-play
Anal Sex
Male/Male Sex
Artistic Nudity as well as Explicit and Gratuitous Nudity

name: The Ambassador's Coterie

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Any modern processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any modern graphics card (2014+)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any modern processor
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any modern graphics card (2014+)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Slow-burn kinetic short story about two Ambassadors of differing stations, empires, and species reclaiming their common ground -- and other common 'areas'.
